attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Determines the type of the alert (success, warn, error, info).

attributes.name: dismissable
attributes.description: Allows the alert to be closed by the user.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Adds an icon to the alert, if not set, the icon will be determined by the variant.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Determines if the alert is visible or not.

cssProperties.name: --color
cssProperties.description: The color of the alert, if not set, it will be determined by the variant.

cssParts.name: icon
cssParts.description: The icon part of the alert

cssParts.name: close
cssParts.description: The close (dismiss) button part of the alert
